name: Luddites, unite! Roll back Tumblr's editor changes
description: A first cut at restoring the TinyMCE editor layout. (Yes, I can see that the media menu jumps around. First things first...)
additional_info: Tumblr has dropped TinyMCE as the post editor in favor of contentEditable HTML elements. (Yikes! It's your funeral, Tumblr.) This is basically a worksheet with which I can experiment with various "fixes". 1. Setting the editor's media controls to block or inline-block somehow prevents the post title from being selected. D/C'ed.
